data.description:
Hourly forecast is a watch face designed for daylong outdoor activities like Randonneuring!

Features:
-Shows temperatures, conditions, wind speeds and directions in coming 6 hours.
-Moon phrase display for your night walk.
-Current temperature, wind speed and gust wind info, and condition.
-Current location and updated time.
-Cached data for 36hrs, no need to wait for loading every time!
-Manually choose your location.
-Black or white colour schemes!

Thanks for:
https://github.com/erikflowers/weather-icons for nice icon!

https://github.com/cynorg/PebbleTimely for nice example how to create an informative watch face!

TTF editor for icon font: 
https://icomoon.io

GIF editor for screenshots:
http://gifmaker.me/

http://openfontlibrary.org/en/font/hanken
for nice Hanken Book font!

latest_release.release_notes:
20160320 - v3.105
- fix wind arrow direction
- update SDK

data.title: Hourly forecast 3

data.description:
Design and Art Direction by Paul Joel - www.pauljoel.com

Simple and clean watchface featuring large date and time as well as current temperature and weather condition. Battery percentage represented both by number and color of the top line. Bottom line indicates Bluetooth connection, it disappears upon Bluetooth disconnect.
 
Configurable option include date, time and temperature format as well as vibe on Bluetooth disconnect and color inversion. 

Multi-language support.

You will need to get free key for weather services at https://developer.forecast.io - this is one time procedure

latest_release.release_notes: - added support for Pebble 2/Diorite and Timeline quick view

data.title: Clean & Smart

data.description: Dots are used to indicate hour, the curve indicates the progress through the hour. The number in the middle is the percent of the day remaining.

data.description:
That bit around the outside is a 24 hour dial that shows the position of the sun and the horizon line. It uses location services and the power of maths to adjust the horizon and solar noon angle for your current location.

Version 2 brings a cleaner and more readable display, along with support for Timeline Quick View, the Pebble 2 and the Pebble Time 2.

data.description:
This is a paid watch-face. You can purchase this face individually for $0.99 or purchase our entire collection of 20+ faces for $5.99. You can purchase within the settings page.

Text Time brings a elegent and stylish text based watch face to your Pebble watch. Every minute that changes brings smooth sliding animations that make for a professional looking face. Change the background color, the text color, and the accent color. Save your phone's battery by choosing fixed location for the weather temperature.

Top Features:
- Sliding animations every minute
- Supports English, Spanish, Dutch, French, German, Italian, Danish and Swedish
- Fixed location weather (No smartphone GPS required)
- Change the background color, main color, and accent color

とてもかわいいので、Pebbleのなかでも廻ってもらうことにしました。くるくる廻る寿司ゆきを、ぜひ可愛がってください。

Notice:
This watch face is not official, but using images are provided from sushiyuki creator, awayuki.
Sushiyuki is Licensed under CC-BY-NC-ND.

このウォッチフェイスは公式ではありませんが、使用している画像は寿司ゆきの作者、awayukiさんからご提供いただいきました。
寿司ゆきはクリエイティブ・コモンズ 表示 - 非営利 - 改変禁止 4.0 国際 ライセンスで提供されています。

data.description:
SpeedWatch

Have you ever wanted a digital speedometer on your wrist?

SpeedWatch uses the speed and heading of your smartphone to display
a digital readouts right on your Pebble.

A trip timer is also included.

Simply select this watchface when you begin your drive.

Note:  This app will use the smartphone's GPS for accurate location services.
We recommend charging your smartphone in the vehicle while using this app.

latest_release.release_notes: Added more responsive GPS lookup

data.title: SpeedWatch

data.description:
Simple, plain, Destiny inspired watch.  First watchface attempt.  Enjoy! Feel free to send in comments/suggestions.

Includes Date, Weather and battery level. Uses location from phone to display weather.

Note* Battery level is the red gauge at the top.

NEW: Use the configuration page to pick either C/F for temperature.  24hr/12hr time depending on what your pebble time is set to display.  Vibrate/BT Icon when bluetooth connection is lost.

Donations appreciated:
paypal.me/AsianButtahs

data.description:
A minimalistic and easy to read Watchface for Pebble Time. 

Examples: 07:54am, 10:25am, 08:30pm, 01:23pm, 5:02pm
Font: Leco, Gothic Bold

Settings: 
- Bluetooth disconnect vibration
- Text Color
- Background Color
- Show Leading Zero
- Show AM/PM
- Big Numbers
- Blink AM/PM
- Preset Colors and Format

Note: When 'Larger Numbers' is selected, AM/PM are positioned Top-Right [AM] & Bottom-Right [PM]

data.description:
WHO WANTS A ROUND WATCH HAVING A FABULOUS SQUARE ONE WITH A BIG ROUND INSIDE?

Highly configurable analog Clock with multiple configuration options. Made your own clock.

- Now you can change backlight period when shaking your watch. (bad for battery :D )

- Now with the possibility of adding Screen Saver (test it using the config page) to increase battery life. Put oils of Picasso, VanGogh, Modigliani, etc on your wrist !!!

- From Big to small clock sphere, chose the aspect ratio you want. 

- Shows day of week and Month in the local language (soon available for Pebble Time). 

- Shows battery through small squares or two chained squares when fully charged. 

- If Bluetooth detection is On, a small Circle over battery appears if you lost connection, you can choose also a double vibe in this case. 

- Lot of color Themes combinations and different Watch Hands for choose. 

- You can also configure, Show Shadows, Date Box, Bluetooth alert, Draw external circle, use or not Seconds hand, etc. 

+ If you see a Bug, please delete from locker and install last version, if it persist then send me an email. Any suggestion will be also welcome. 

+ Review an reinstall when new versions came up.

latest_release.release_notes: solving issues with date font size

data.title: Titan

data.author: Ronny Carr

changelog.release_notes: Now Available on Pebble Time Round
- another fix for the Moon display on Classic & Steel
- fix the Moon outline on Classic & Steel
- Increase the date font size a bit to better match the time

Version 2.0 is here!

- Inverted colors option
- Larger time font
- Updated settings to Slate

- On Pebble Time, don't show the dark gray background if the 'outline' option is turned off
- A menu icon!

-Sunrise/set times should be correct again for both OS 2.X and 3
-Change day of month color to lighter orange for visibility

If you aren't seeing the correct sunrise/set time, send me an email.

Like the watch face? Please remember to give it a "Heart"!

Updated for Pebble Time!

This version removes the inverted view, this option may return in the future.

Back so soon? You bet! This release removes the leading '0' from the time formats when the watch is set to 12h style. The sunrise/sunset time will now display AM/PM in 12h style as well (not the current time).

Have feedback or a comment? Let me know through the 'email developer' link!

Some great changes in this release! You can now configure certain aspects of the watch face!

New Configurable Options
-Invert display colors
-Show or hide the Moon outline
-Set weather start/end fetch times
-Use F or C for temperature

As always, if you have feedback or comments please feel free to email using the developer link.

-Fix sunrise time not displaying before sunrise and after sunset

-Check weather 24 hours a day, for the hard workers of the night! (this will be configurable in the future)
Initial release. Enjoy!

data.description:

- Inverted color option

Weather powered by forecast.io

changelog.release_notes:
Glyph 1.2

- Added support for Easy and Medium viewing modes (more line segments drawn)
- Added Two Tap option for calendar display.  This allows using a single tap / shake to turn on the LED backlight while still showing the time, and the 2nd tap / shake within 5 seconds shows the calendar (if enabled).
- Added configuration option to swap the location of the hours and 5x minutes on the display.
- Added an icon to indicate if the hours and 5x minutes are swapped.
Fixed time reported in Tutorial for Pebble / Pebble Steel.  Time was being reported at 7:04 but should have stated 7:09 instead.

Initial release.

- Live tested on Pebble Watch
- Color modes tested only in emulation.

data.description:
Glyph

Displays time using hexagonal shaped line segments that "point" to the numbers on a traditional clock.  The resulting displays sorta resemble hieroglyphs, thus the name.

The config page provides several options, including one to display time in text form as well as an option to launch a tutorial which teaches how to read the time.

In addition to the time, Glyph will display a calendar of the current month, triggered by a tap event (or wrist flick action).  


Times displayed on the screenshots:

2:02
8:25
1:09

The Glyph watch face for Pebble is modeled after the Glyph LED Watch designed by Justin Schofield of the UK, and published with his permission.

latest_release.release_notes:
Glyph 1.2

- Added support for Easy and Medium viewing modes (more line segments drawn)
- Added Two Tap option for calendar display.  This allows using a single tap / shake to turn on the LED backlight while still showing the time, and the 2nd tap / shake within 5 seconds shows the calendar (if enabled).
- Added configuration option to swap the location of the hours and 5x minutes on the display.
- Added an icon to indicate if the hours and 5x minutes are swapped.

data.title: Glyph

data.description:
Elliptical is a ellipse shaped watchface where the hands follow the same shape. The shape of the dial follows the resolution of the watch (the shape will be a circle on a square shaped screen, like the Round watches).

WARNING, the hour hand (when it is vertical position) can be longer than the minute hand (when it is in horizontal position) which could lead to misreading the time (although as the hour hand is always red, this is not likely)

data.author: Kohjb

changelog.release_notes: 26/10/15: New features: Weather instead of PSI is available. PSI warning thresholds can be set. Vibrate when thresholds met. Automatically select closest PSI reading based on your GPS location.
24 Oct 2016: Added Oval and Square Watch faces. Fixed PSI bug - NEA changed their data format so PSI/PM2.5 readings were off. PM2.5 readings now 1 hour readings.
12 Oct 2015: Add Configuration page: Enable selecting whether Secondhand is displayed, 2 backgrounds to choose from, select region in Singapore for PSI reading.
7 Oct 2015: Bug fixes for Aplite (normal Pebble). Fixed Hands not moving, Bluetooth icon, outline hands to enable easier reading of numbers.
4 Oct 2015 : PSI Info is now 3-Hr reading instead of 24-hr. Minor bug-fix - PSI reading's color code fixed.
3/10/15: Added Support for Aplite.

2 Oct 2015 : First release of Singapore Hazewatch Watchface.
Key Features:
- Analog 3D Watchface.
- Digital Time, Day, Date that "floats" above the analog hand, easier to read. 
- Includes Battery Level - Blue for normal, Pink for medium, Red for low.
- Includes Bluetooth Connection - Blue for connected, Red for disconnected (with vibrate)
- Includes Singapore PSI/PM2.5 reading (e.g. 105/87) from NEA. Reading turns red when PSI is >150 or PM2.5>100 to indicate unhealthy range.

data.description:
Singapore Hazewatch : Beautiful analog 3D watch that also shows the Singapore PSI/PM2.5 reading. Includes digital day/date/time, and battery/bluetooth status. Use Settings to modify default options.

Key Features:
- Analog 3D Watchface, 3 watch shapes, 2 background colors to choose from.
- Digital Time, Day, Date that "floats" above the analog hand, easier to read
- Secondhand optional to conserve battery life
- Includes Battery Level - Blue for normal, Pink for medium, Red for low
- Includes Bluetooth Connection - Blue for connected, Red for disconnected (with vibrate)
- Choose between Singapore PSI/PM2.5 reading (e.g. 105/87) from NEA or Weather report (temperature, conditions)
- PSI reading turns red when PSI is >150 or PM2.5>100 to indicate unhealthy range.
- Settable PSI/PM2.5 Thresholds (default is 150/100)
- Vibrate when Thresholds are crossed to alert you to use caution.
- Automatically select closest PSI/PM2.5 region reading based on phone location.
- Select frequency to update Weather/PSI information (default 1 hour)

latest_release.release_notes: 26/10/15: New features: Weather instead of PSI is available. PSI warning thresholds can be set. Vibrate when thresholds met. Automatically select closest PSI reading based on your GPS location.

data.title: Singapore Hazewatch

data.description:
THIS IS NOT A NORMAL WATCHFACE. You probably have no use for it.  It does not tell the time in any way.  It can, however, be used to get rid of a residual image or "ghosting" left as a result of a watch freeze.  It does this by rapidly cycling through all of the colors on the watch face (or just black and white on the original pebble).  As it cycles, the residual image should fade.  

It will likely DRAIN YOUR BATTERY quickly and may DAMAGE YOUR SCREEN if you use it for an extended period of time.  

I TAKE NO RESPONSIBILITY FOR ANY DAMAGE DONE TO YOUR WATCH.

latest_release.release_notes: Added support for Pebble Round

2015.10.02.1.3
Initial release

data.description:
Watch out for the haze!

Get the latest Pollutant Standards Index (PSI) level in Singapore, with data fetched directly from the National Environment Agency (NEA) every 30 minutes.

The PSI is displayed front and center in large font.
The background color reflects the levels - closely following the NEA color scheme.
On the top left is the current day.
On the top right is the current date, in a Month and Date format
Bottom left, in bold, is the "wording" associated with the current PSI level, also following the NEA standards.
There is also a relative timestamp, to let you know when the data was last refreshed.
And finally the time is displayed on the bottom right.

latest_release.release_notes: Updated the API URL

data.title: Singapore PSI

data.author: PFR Productions

changelog.release_notes: v1.5 - Fixes broken settings page (google disabled web hosting on drive)
V1.4 Fixed timing issue that meant that pre and post fight screens would speed up over the course of multiple fights if the app wasnt reset. Should also improve battery life
v1.3 - Fixed rumble option not being saved that meant it would revert to being on as soon as you reloaded the watchface

V1.2 
Fixed missing weather icon after OpenWeather added new protocol.
Updated to work with new SDK. 
Reduced message box sizes for memory saving (might use this later).
v1.1 Settings page now remembers what settings were chosen previously. Upgrading users will need to update settings once for this to take effect.
V1.01 RC1. Final bug fixes and memory savings

data.description:
Whos the greatest fighter of them all? Let fate, the passage of time and you physical activity decide as 8 of the worlds greatest warriors from the worlds greatest fighting game duke it out.
Each hour if you've walked enough steps to beat the hidden total your character will win a round. Win 3 rounds to progress. Hidden Step target increases every match but partially resets if you win the whole tournament. How far can you go?

(make sure you check out the settings before starting)

Advanced features
-Battery meter
-Weather indicator
-Option to select US date format
-Rumble alerts to beginning of fight, can be toggled off in settings
-Sleep time range to prevent fights when you'd typically not be walking around
-Plane at bottom of screen shows time between fights and flags show fighters nationalities.
-30 min step chart to show your recent activity (height of bar is relative to the most active minute you've had in that 30 min spell)
-Full save support. Toggle between different faces and apps and you can come back to where you where at a later time.
-Option to reset all stats and start again
-All 8 of the original World warriors are selectable as your character.


Disclaimer
This is a non-profit fan made project dedicated to the game that inspired me to be a developer. All sprites and backgrounds are Capcom's. Its thanks to them that we've had the best fighting games of the last 25 years. Thank you Capcom.

latest_release.release_notes: v1.5 - Fixes broken settings page (google disabled web hosting on drive)

data.title: Fighting Street Time

data.description:
Simple digital face showing current weather, and the forecast for next 3 days.

Configurable background and foreground colors, as well as temperature units.

Weather info provided by openweathermap.org. You can also choose weather underground if you provide an API key (http://wunderground.com/weather/api).

Note: forecast starts with today if it is before 3:00PM / 15:00, otherwise starts with tomorrow

data.author: Matt Herron

changelog.release_notes: Improved battery life. Reset ally name alignment.
Now with configurable Pokemon names and animation triggers!

Ally Poke'mon level now uses Pebble Health data to display your percent of today's total step goal achieved. 

Charizard becomes shiny after hitting your total daily step goal. 

Enemy Poke'mon health now uses Pebble Health data to display percent current step goal. (The more on-track you are, the less health the enemy has).

Added support for 24HR time format (I heard you!). 

Added day of the week to date.

Removed animation on wrist-flick to reduce battery consumption.

Enemy Poke'mon level is now max (100) (Have good ideas for what this number could represent? Let me know!).

--Unchanged--
Ally health is still battery life.

--Coming soon--
Next up is ability to customize Pokemon names!
Initial release!

data.description:
This is a watchface inspired by the awesome PokeBattle watchface. I wanted to make something similar for the pebble time, that took advantage of color. 

Ally Poke'mon level now uses Pebble Health data to display your percent of today's total step goal achieved.

Enemy Poke'mon health now uses Pebble Health data to display percent current step goal. (The more on-track you are, the less health the enemy has).

Ally health is battery level.

Sleep status on BT disconnect.

Paralyzed status on charging.

Shiny Charizard after hitting your daily step goal!

Now with configurable Pokemon names and animation triggers!

I really wanted to switch Pokemon as PokeBattle does, but with just a few animated pokemon PNGs I'm pushing the limits of resources, so I'd have to download the data from the phone which makes it a much more complicated process, not sure if it would even work. In the meantime, we get 3 Poke'mon sprites (1 enemy, 1 normal ally, 1 shiny ally) If you'd like to customize with your own Pokemon choices, feel free to fork this on GitHub and change the resources. I got the sprites from: http://sprites.pokecheck.org/ and converted the GIF to APNG with:http://gif2apng.sourceforge.net/

Special thanks to user derfreimann  for sharing the PokeBattle code. 

Tags: Pokemon, Nintendo, Pokémon

This is a fan-made work for no profit and without claims of ownership of anything Pokemon. Pokemon is owned by Nintendo.

latest_release.release_notes: Improved battery life. Reset ally name alignment.

data.title: PokeBattle Color for Pebble Time

data.description:
Squarestyle is an easy to read digital watch face with day, month, date, weather and battery level display.

Unique to the Time is the option to create your own color theme using hand picked colors from the Pebble's palette that are guaranteed to pop off the screen. 

Think you've found the perfect theme for a night out, or a sporting event? Share it with friends! Squarestyle can export themes in easy to copy & paste code snippets that you can share. Simply send your snippet and friends can import it to automatically apply the shared theme!

The weather reporting comes from openweathermaps.org. Your location can be automatically determined by your phone's GPS, or manually entered to save battery life.

Configurables:
• Custom Colors
• Set animation intervals
• Disable animation
• Hour vibration
• Weather on/off
• C/F display
• Weather update timer
• Weather GPS Location or Manual

latest_release.release_notes: config fix

data.description:
Relive the 80's PAC-MAN FEVER on your wrist!

PAC•TIME is an easy to read watch face with, and a unique weather display row of current conditions, and configurable animation sequences. PAC•TIME also displays the month, date, date, battery level and Bluetooth connection.

Weather is provided by Openweathermaps.org, and is automatically polled based on your current location. Weather icons are added together to describe the conditions from left to right starting after the Bluetooth icon to the left of the Cherry. Orange = Day, Banana = Night.

Configurable Options:
• Flick to Animate
• Animate every X minutes
• Disable Animation
• Hourly Vibration
• Enable/Disable Weather
• C/F Weather Format
• Weather update interval

latest_release.release_notes: UPDATED CONFIG SCREEN

data.author: kametman

changelog.release_notes: Version 1.0: initial release.

data.description:
Left eye shows hour.  Right eye + nose shows minutes (number of blocks in noses * 12 + right eye position; 5-block nose = 0).  Shorten teeth shows month date (top row, ones; bottom row, fives).  Eyebrows are battery indicator.

First image: 10:57; 26th of month.
Second image: 6:13; 8th of month.

latest_release.release_notes: Version 1.0: initial release.

data.title: KaMet Skull

data.author: Keegan

changelog.release_notes: - Fixed the "Direct Input" field in settings.

- Disabled the animations when the minute changes to improve battery life. (There is an options in the settings to re-enable them)
 - Added a setting to allow the artwork to fill the screen on rectangular devices
 - Added support for Timeline Quick View
- Ported configuration page to Clay

Added support for: 
 - Pebble Classic
 - Pebble Steel
 - Pebble Time
 - Pebble Time Steel
- Now using the refined drawing functions in DP6
- Initial Release

data.description:
Hours are the shown as a number filling the whole display. Minutes are shown behind the hour in the middle 

Fully customizable colors with 6 presets ready to go.  

Screenshots show:
 - 2:14
 - 4:44
 - 7:35
 - 3:20
 - 7:56

Keywords: Round, Color, Digital, Simple, Artistic,

latest_release.release_notes: - Fixed the "Direct Input" field in settings.
